label: AB3C_hR10_167_b_e_a-001
title: PrNiO$_{3}$ Rhombohedral Perovskite Structure
comments:
This structure has the same crystal structure and occupies the same Wyckoff positions as \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC3_hR10_167_a_b_e-002}{Calcite (CaCO$_{3}$, $G0_{1}$, ABC3\_hR10\_167\_a\_b\_e)}, but $c/a$ and $x_{3}$ are different enough to warrant calling this a new structure.
 This is the high-temperature form of PrNiO$_{3}$, and we present the data collected at $500^{\circ}$C, below which it transforms into the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C_oP20_62_c_cd_a-001}{orthorhombic perovskite structure (AB3C\_oP20\_62\_c\_cd\_a)}. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
